title: Political Roundtable: Raimondo on the Lally Controversy, PawSox & Trying to Improve RI's Economy
content: Governor Gina Raimondo joins Political Roundtable this week to discuss her efforts to improve RI's economy; whether she'll support keeping the PawSox in Pawtucket; and the controversy about her administration hiring former state Rep. Donald Lally four months after he left office.
